理解

全排列的简单运用

代码

#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
    string str;
    while (cin >> str)
    {

        sort(str.begin(), str.end());
        cout << str << endl;
        while (next_permutation(str.begin(), str.end()))
        {
            cout << str << endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
